decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost creatures and burn spells to put pressure on the opponent. It aims to deal damage efficiently and consistently while maintaining card advantage through cantrips and card draw spells. The synergy between cheap creatures and pump spells allows for explosive turns that can overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The deck's mana base is optimized to ensure consistent access to both red and blue sources, enabling flexibility in casting spells of either color.

This deck focuses on utilizing low-cost spells and creatures to quickly deal damage to the opponent, while maintaining card advantage through cantrips and draw spells. By making use of aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Slickshot Show-Off, along with burn spells like Burst Lightning and Torch the Tower, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. The inclusion of counterspells like Spell Pierce adds an element of control to protect your creatures and spells. The mana base is optimized for a fast and consistent mana curve.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay by using a mix of powerful creatures like Qarsi Revenant, Floodpits Drowner, and Spyglass Siren to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also includes disruptive spells like Go for the Throat and Phantom Interference to control the board and protect your creatures. Enduring Curiosity helps with card draw to maintain aggression. The inclusion of powerful legendary creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares adds additional threats to the board. Overall, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and control the battlefield to secure a victory.

The deck focuses on quickly and aggressively dealing damage to the opponent by utilizing cheap and efficient spells, as well as utilizing prowess abilities to boost creatures. The deck aims to control the board and pressure the opponent early on, using a mix of burn spells and prowess creatures to maintain tempo and apply pressure. The deck also includes some card draw and protection spells to help maintain its aggressive game plan. Though not controlling the long game, this deck aims to win the game quickly and decisively.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing a mix of powerful creatures like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Floodpits Drowner, along with removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down, the deck aims to control the board while dealing damage to the opponent at the same time. Additionally, cards like Duress and Spyglass Siren provide disruption and card advantage, allowing the deck to maintain pressure on the opponent throughout the game.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing a variety of spells and creatures to disrupt your opponent's strategies and maintain board control. With a mix of removal spells like Day of Judgment, Temporary Lockdown, and Get Lost, along with powerful creatures like Zur, Eternal Schemer and Overlord of the Mistmoors, you can outmaneuver and outlast your opponent. Leyline Binding and Ride's End help to further control the battlefield, while cards like Up the Beanstalk provide additional resources. With a diverse mana base and strategic land choices, you can effectively manage your resources and stay ahead of your opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage efficiently and swiftly. The strategy is to maintain board control through a combination of cheap and efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Emberheart Challenger, supported by impactful burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike. Witchstalker Frenzy provides additional pressure, while cards like Monstrous Rage and Screaming Nemesis help to boost the damage output. The goal is to finish the game as quickly as possible by capitalizing on the speed and aggression of the deck.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful burn spells to quickly deplete their life total. The deck includes a mix of low-cost creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Hired Claw, along with removal spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike to clear the way for attacks. The deck also includes cards like Monstrous Rage and Soulstone Sanctuary to provide additional damage and staying power. By constantly applying pressure and forcing the opponent to react, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using various spells and artifacts to disrupt your opponent's strategy while progressing your own win condition. The deck includes cards that can counter enemy spells, remove threats from the board, and generate card advantage. By carefully managing your resources and timing your plays effectively, you can outmaneuver your opponent and secure victory. Additionally, the deck has a strong mana base to ensure you have access to the colors you need to cast your spells consistently.

The deck focuses on using Omniscience to cast powerful spells for free, allowing for explosive plays. It includes cards like Marang River Regent and Roiling Dragonstorm to deal massive damage, while also having control elements like Spell Pierce for protection. Stock Up and Meticulous Archive help to dig for key combo pieces, and Abuelo's Awakening and Moment of Truth provide additional utility. The deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of big threats and disruptive spells.

The deck focuses on assembling key pieces like Omniscience and Roiling Dragonstorm to create a powerful combo that allows the player to cast multiple spells for free and overwhelm the opponent. Marang River Regent and Temporary Lockdown provide additional support and disruption, while Meticulous Archive helps dig for important cards. The inclusion of cards like Spell Pierce and Ephara's Dispersal allows for interaction with the opponent's spells, while Stock Up and Moment of Truth help maintain card advantage. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and win the game in explosive fashion.

The deck focuses on using control cards like Leyline Binding and Temporary Lockdown to stall the opponent's plays while building up mana through cards like Up the Beanstalk and Floodfarm Verge. The win condition is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Zur, Eternal Schemer and Overlord of the Hauntwoods. Additionally, the deck includes removal spells like Elspeth's Smite and Ride's End to deal with threats. The deck also includes a variety of lands to ensure consistent mana production and allows for flexibility in casting spells of different colors.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly build a board presence with aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, while utilizing cheap spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage to deal damage efficiently. The deck aims to maintain tempo and pressure the opponent by utilizing card draw spells like Sleight of Hand and Opt to find key pieces. Additionally, the inclusion of counterspells like Spell Pierce provides some protection against removal or opposing threats. The mana base allows for consistent casting of spells and creatures, ensuring a smooth aggressive game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent by using low-cost spells and creatures with aggressive abilities. By efficiently utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Burst Lightning, while also maintaining card advantage with Opt and Sleight of Hand, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. Additionally, the deck includes some control elements like Spell Pierce to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, the deck focuses on fast-paced gameplay and applying pressure to win the game quickly.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly push damage through with aggressive creatures and cheap spells. By playing efficient threats like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter alongside burn spells and card draw like Burst Lightning and Opt, this deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain momentum throughout the game. Utilizing cards like Stormchaser's Talent and Monstrous Rage, the deck can pump up its creatures for even more damage output. With a mana base that allows for consistent casting of its spells, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently.

This Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a mix of creatures and spells. By utilizing cards like Abhorrent Oculus and Spyglass Siren to establish early board control, and finishing off with powerful spells like Torch the Tower and Fear of Missing Out, the deck aims to deal damage swiftly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Inti, Seneschal of the Sun and Tersa Lightshatter provide additional versatility and options for different situations. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure smooth mana curve and efficient gameplay.
